ygData.subject: Re: Can't get in
ygData.msgSnippet: It s an error 1001, saying there was a failure to connect to the login server. I get those if I try to log in while there is a patch going on. Once it happened
ygData.messageBody:
It's an error 1001, saying there was a failure to connect to the
login server. I get those if I try to log in while there is a patch
going on. Once it happened after a patch and I was locked out for two
days until another patch was run. Good thing it does not occur often.
Got email in to sony. Anoying, as I had set aside several hours to
quest today and found them wasted.

Guess I will play an alternate game. Spent the day hunting sites for
good stuff to quest for. Sony should no better than to frustrate
their addicts. Not smart. There are other dealers on the street.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@y...> wrote:
> check out this link, it gives status of downtime and
> servers.
>
> http://everquest.station.sony.com/netstat/index.jsp
>
> are you dialing in or through a router? Make sure any
> home Firewall software is not conflicing.
>
> Good Luck
>
> Rob
>
>
